Package io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.providers.impl

Class SmintIoApiClientImpl

java.lang.Object
io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.providers.impl.SmintIoApiClientImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISmintIoApiClient
public class SmintIoApiClientImpl extends Object implements ISmintIoApiClient
Implementing classes utilize the Smint.io CLAPI consumer core library to access Smint.io API and provide sync data.

The data to be synchronized by ISyncJob need to be fetched from the Smint.io RESTful API. This is done by implementing classes - usually utilizing the available Smint.io Client API Consumer Library.

  • Field Details

    • RETRY_MAX_ATTEMPTS

      public static final int RETRY_MAX_ATTEMPTS
      The maximum amount of tries to connect to the Smint.io API. 
           RETRY_MAX_ATTEMPTS = 5
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • RETRY_WAIT_FOR_NEXT_RETRY

      public static final int RETRY_WAIT_FOR_NEXT_RETRY
      The amount of milliseconds to wait before a new try to call the Smint.io API is performed.

      The waiting duration between next try is doubled on each retry, this is the initial value in milli seconds. 

           RETRY_WAIT_FOR_NEXT_RETRY = 2000
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SMINT_IO_API_BASE_URL

      public static final String SMINT_IO_API_BASE_URL
      The base URL of the Smint.io API.

      The placeholder will be replaced with the tenant ID utilizing MessageFormat 

       SMINT_IO_API_BASE_URL = "https://{0}.clapi.smint.io/consumer/v1"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SMINT_IO_CONTENT_ELEMENT_URL

      public static final String SMINT_IO_CONTENT_ELEMENT_URL
      The URL template of an asset URL within the Smint.io API.

      This template is used to create the Smin.io API URL to the information about an asset. The placeholder will be replaced utilizing MessageFormat with the following values:

      1. tenant ID (see ISettingsModel.getTenantId())
      2. project UUID (see SyncLicensePurchaseTransaction.getProjectUuid())
      3. content element UUID (see ISmintIoAsset.getContentElementUuid())
       SMINT_IO_API_BASE_URL = "https://{0}.clapi.smint.io/consumer/v1"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SMINT_IO_ASSET_LIST_CHUNKSIZE

      public static final int SMINT_IO_ASSET_LIST_CHUNKSIZE
      The chunks size of the list of assets fetched from the Smint.io platform API.

      Since the list of assets to sync could be extreme long, it is split into chunks of this maximum fixed size. How many assets are to be synched can not be determined in advance. It depends on activity and delay between synchronization runs. 

       SMINT_IO_ASSET_LIST_CHUNKSIZE = 10
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      Specified by:
      getGenericMetadata in interface ISmintIoApiClient
      Returns:
      Might be null in case no data can be retrieved from the server.
      Throws:
      io.smint.clapi.consumer.generated.ApiException - in case calling the Smint.io platform RESTful API failed.

    • getAssets

      public ISmintIoApiDataWithContinuation<ISmintIoAsset[]> getAssets(String continuationUuid, boolean includeCompoundAssets, boolean includeBinaryUpdates) throws io.smint.clapi.consumer.generated.ApiException
      Description copied from interface: ISmintIoApiClient
      Retrieves all assets from the Smint.io API server that are to be synchronized to the target.

      The data is retrieved in chunks, because the binary assets might become very big. Callers need to provide the continuation UUID, that has been returned by the previous call, to the next call. Hence continuation is "chained".

      Specified by:
      getAssets in interface ISmintIoApiClient
      Parameters:
      continuationUuid - the continuation UUID to send to the server to keep track on already transmitted data. Reading all data in chunks is much more responsive and much faster than reading all at once.
      includeCompoundAssets - set to true in case compound assets are supported by the synchronization target and thus should be included in the list of assets to be synchronized.
      includeBinaryUpdates - set to true in case updating binary assets is supported with the synchronization target and thus updates should be included in the list of assets to be synced.
      Returns:
      null in case no data has been retrieved from the server.
      Throws:
      io.smint.clapi.consumer.generated.ApiException - in case calling the Smint.io platform RESTful API failed.
